## Check Correlations
```{r}
za6838kum %>% select(contains("_4046")) %>% mutate(across(everything(), ~as.numeric(.))) %>%
  psych::cor.plot(.,stars = T)
za6838kum %>% select(contains("_4046")) %>% mutate(across(everything(), ~as.numeric(.))) %>%
  psych::corr.test()
```

## Check ICC
```{r}
# ICC requires VARs to be numeric, even when they seem to are numeric -> mutate!

za6838kum %>% select(contains("_4046")) %>% psych::ICC()

```


## Recode

```{r}
za6838kum %<>% mutate(across(contains("_4046"), ~rec(., rec = "-99,-95,-93=NA; else = copy")))
za6838kum %<>% mutate(across(contains("_4046"), ~rec(., rec = "-99,-95,-93=NA; else = copy"))) 

za6838kum %<>% mutate(across(contains("_1570"), ~rec(., rec = "-99,-95,-93=NA; else = copy")))

za6838kum %>% select(ends_with("_1570g")) %>% 
  mutate(across(everything(), ~as.numeric(.))) %>%
  psych::ICC(.)
za6838kum %>% select("kp15_4046","kp19_4046","kp23_4046") %>% 
  mutate(across(everything(), ~as.numeric(.))) %>%
  psych::ICC()
za6838kum %>% select(contains("_4046")) %>% psych::corr.test()
```
